meanings.definition: Not using the voice to produce sound.
meanings.sent1: The mime's performance was completely nonvocal.
meanings.sent2: The sleeping baby was nonvocal throughout the night.
meanings.sent3: The nonvocal tree rustled its leaves in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The nonvocal stars twinkled in the silent night sky.
meanings.sent5: The nonvocal library was filled with the sound of turning pages.

meanings.definition: Not expressed or communicated through speech.
meanings.sent1: Her nonvocal gestures spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent2: The artist's nonvocal artwork conveyed deep emotions.
meanings.sent3: The nonvocal message was delivered through a series of drawings.
meanings.sent4: The nonvocal emotions danced in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The nonvocal communication was clear through the written note.

meanings.definition: Not involving or related to speaking or vocalization.
meanings.sent1: The nonvocal activity focused on hand movements.
meanings.sent2: The nonvocal event was enjoyed by all participants.
meanings.sent3: The nonvocal game required only visual cues.
meanings.sent4: The nonvocal dance expressed emotions through movement.
meanings.sent5: The nonvocal class emphasized nonverbal communication.
